pli-tv-bi-vb-pc40:1.12_0: the Buddha said, “And, monks, the nuns should recite this training rule like this:
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc40:1.13.1_0: ‘If a nun who has completed the rainy-season residence does not go wandering, even if only 65 to 80 kilometers, she commits an offense entailing confession.’”
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc40:1.1_0: At one time when the Buddha was staying at Sāvatthī in Anāthapiṇḍika’s Monastery,
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc40:1.2_0: At that time the nuns were staying right there at Rājagaha for the rainy season, the cold season, and the hot season.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc40:1.3_0: People then complained and criticized those nuns,
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc40:1.4_0: “The nuns are leaving the districts in darkness and obscurity. They don’t brighten them up.”
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc40:1.5_0: Nuns heard the complaints of those people,
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc40:1.6_0: Those nuns then told the monks.
